/usr/bin/clang++ -g -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX14.0.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=13.5 -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/test1.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/test1.dir/src/tools/display_texture.cpp.o CMakeFiles/test1.dir/src/tools/load_ffmpeg.cpp.o -o test1   -L/Users/haoyin/Desktop/ffmpeg_player/ffmpeg/lib  -L/Users/haoyin/Desktop/ffmpeg_player/glfw/lib-x86_64  -Wl,-rpath,/Users/haoyin/Desktop/ffmpeg_player/ffmpeg/lib -Wl,-rpath,/Users/haoyin/Desktop/ffmpeg_player/glfw/lib-x86_64 -lavcodec -lavdevice -lavfilter -lavformat -lavutil -lglfw3 -framework Foundation -framework CoreGraphics -framework IOKIT -framework AppKit -framework OpenGl
